response.original_title: Nightbeast 2: The Legend of the Ronin Sword
response.overview: The sequel to the tribute. A re-re-imagining of the original re-classic. Night beast vs The Ronin: They walk irrevocably onward, their fates matched in the theatre of morality. This is the winter of Night-Beast's discontent. See the Night-Beast lay down its' seal of lies, the manifesto of its' hideous delights...see the Ronin walk on in pursuit, ever soul-searching. Tasting death.
response.tagline: THEY WALK IRREVOCABLY ONWARD, THEIR FATES MATCHED IN THE THEATRE OF MORALITY.... THIS IS THE WINTER OF NIGHT-BEASTS DISCONTENT!
response.title: Nightbeast 2: The Legend of the Ronin Sword
